metadata.name: Turusu river #1
metadata.description: The Turus� project was originally conceived and developed by Helios Crypto Art in partnership with the Brazilian artist Jo�o Miranda. There are three collections of 10,000 NFTs Arte in each collection: The Forest, The River and The Village.  These collections are intended for anyone concerned with the cause of indigenous tribes and the preservation of the Amazon rainforest as well as collectors of quality digital art.  10% of NFT sales will be donated to entities and organizations that defend and protect indigenous communities and the Amazon rainforest. The sale of the three collections will bring about one million dollars in donations. This amount may vary depending on the value of Ethereum (ETH) and the exchange rate of the dollar against the brazilian real.  15 unique NFTs will be created that will be put up at auction one month after the collections are released. #1
